attributes.action: Increase the minimum sentance for child abuse/murder
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There should be a minimum sentance of 25 years without parole for people convicted of crimes against children (abuse,manslaughter,murder).This should apply especially to those convicted of the torture and murder of little baby Peter in the Haringey case.
The right to not having identities published should be removed as well.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
